and.attribute: Technical Leader/ Project Manager job - VietnamWorks
1st Floor, 179 Ly Chinh Thang Street, Ward 7, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

We are looking for a “can do” attitude to join us as a team leader with experience delivering successful web and mobile projects. We mainly work with: PHP, Java, Python, HTML5, Jquery, NodeJs, MongoDB, FFmpeg Responsibilities - Translates high-level requirements into specific designs for projects. - Design steps include requirements analysis, performance analysis, benchmarking and bandwidth analysis, and detailed design of the system. - Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress - Plan the project (estimate, staff, risk management, training, etc.) - Track project progress ensuring highest quality of work - Developing team spirit, motivating and building morale; dealing with problems - Mentor and provide guidance to project members - Make presentation/white papers for new initiatives - Help technical team to troubleshoot on technical issues, also advise them on technical approach.

- At least 3 years of experience in wep app development project - At least 1 years of experience with position PM or Team leader - Self-learning, can learn new things quickly and work independently. - Strong communication skills in English - Strong technical software development skills - Advanced in JAVA/PHP/HTML/CSS/MongoDB - Experience with agile development practices, particularly Scrum - Familiarity with project management softwares and/or tools such as: JIRA, Basecamp, Podio,... - Experience with Video Streaming, Ad Network is a plus

DIV.H3: Meme Network 1st Floor, 179 Ly Chinh Thang Street, Ward 7, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

and.attribute: MEME Network is the first company in Vietnam developing and applying the Video Cloud platform successfully. We now have tens of millions play per month. In our long term plan, based on the achievement we have reached, we aim to keep working on the first Video Social Network project in Vietnam. With this project, we want to build the Video Creator community and support them to turn the passion into careers and income. Would you like to work with our creative, funny members who are full of zeal and responsibilities? Let's join MEME to travel with us to success. We need you! More jobs from this employer
